Uses of Class
eu.kartoffelquadrat.otpgenerator.CryptorException

    • Uses of CryptorException in eu.kartoffelquadrat.otpgenerator

      Subclasses of CryptorException in eu.kartoffelquadrat.otpgenerator 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  InvalidPartyException
      Custom Exception indicating a privded party was not recognized.
      class  OneTimePadMissmatchException
      Custom exception that is used whenever an operation is invoked that attempts to combine encrypted messages with the wrong cryptographic material (the wrong one time pad).
      class  OutOfChunksException
      This exception is thrown if the library was requested to encrypt a message but, there are not enough remaining chunks in the provided one time pad.
      Methods in eu.kartoffelquadrat.otpgenerator that throw CryptorException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      EncryptedMessage Conversation.addPlainMessage​(PlainMessage message)
      GHelper method to add a plain message to the conversation.
      protected static byte[] Cryptor.cryptChunkSizedMessage​(byte[] message, byte[] chunk)
      Decryptor / Cryptor helper method implementation for a single message that is short enough to go into a single chunk.
      static PlainMessage Cryptor.decryptMessage​(EncryptedMessage encryptedMessage, OneTimePad pad, boolean text)
      Counterpart for the exnrypt message method.
      static EncryptedMessage Cryptor.encryptMessage​(PlainMessage message, OneTimePad pad, int startChunkId)
      Decryptor method to cencrypt a plain message by applying a series of chunks.
      List<PlainMessage> Conversation.getConversationHistory()
      Exports the unencrypted counterpart of the entire message history.
      protected static String Cryptor.padString​(String message, int targetLength)
      Helper method to pad a String with trailing whitespaces.
